responses: Hello! Welcome to Crescent Education. How can I assist you today?
Hi there!  Welcome to Crescent Education. How can I assist you today?

patterns: Tell me about university
university information
College information
College details
About university
About college
university details
responses: Nestled in the serene greenery of Tambaram, Chennai, B.S. Abdur Rahman Crescent Institute of Science and Technology is a premier institution dedicated to academic excellence, since 1984.  Through our long history of 40+ years of excellence, the Institution has offered access to a wide range of academic opportunities. With 57 programmes, grouped under 12 different Schools, and Ph.D. in all the disciplines, this institution is a rising stalwart in higher education with promising Quality, Security and Placement. We welcome students from all countries and our educational programmes are designed to equip the learners with knowledge that helps them to achieve what they want to be and go where they want to go in the ladder of success.This institution is an intellectual destination that challenges conventional thinking and stimulates passion to redefine learning. The distinctive teaching at this institution makes the students and scholars compete with themselves and each other. Apart from providing top-notch education, our green campus and well-planned student-life are solely dedicated to making students utilize the ambiance to the fullest. Through our wide array of educational programmes and unique clubs to foster student development activities, we provide opportunities and experiences that build a community that helps you grow personally and professionally, and create a place that you can call home now and throughout your life.

responses: Alhaj Dr. B.S.Abdur Rahman. (An uncommon man, of deep conviction and perseverance; his vision runs Crescent today for the benefit of the students, teachers, staff members, alumni and the society.)

responses: Mrs.Qurrath Jameela ((Is the chancellor of B.S.Abdur Rahman university)

patterns: Who is the vice chancellor of college?
Who is the vice chancellor of crescent?
Who is the vice chancellor of university?
responses: Prof. Dr. T. Murugesan. Is the vice chancellor of B.S.Abdur Rahman university (Prof. Dr. Thanabalan Murugesan received his Ph.D in Chemical Engineering from Anna University, Chennai, India, and has been involved in teaching, research and industrial consultancy in Chemical Engineering and allied fields during the past 33 years. After serving as a Scientist at CLRI, Adyar for 5 years, he served as Reader /Professor at ACTech, Anna University for 14 years. Prof. Murugesan joined Universiti Teknologi PETRONAS Malaysia, where served as Professor of Chemical Engineering for the last 15 years.)

patterns: How many departments are there in your college?
How many departments are there?
What all departments do you have?
How many courses or departments are in the college?
What departments are available here?
how many courses are available here ?
responses: B.S. Abdur Rahman Crescent Institute of Science and Technology offers various departments across multiple disciplines, including Mechanical Engineering, Polymer Engineering, Aerospace Engineering, Automobile Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE), Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE), Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering (EIE), Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), Information Technology (IT), Computer Applications, Mathematics and Actuarial Science, Management Studies, Physics, Chemistry, Life Sciences, Pharmacy, Law, Architecture, English, Commerce, Public Policy, and Arabic and Islamic Studies.

patterns: What is the contact info of Crescent University?
How can I reach Crescent Institute?
Give me the phone number of Crescent University?
Where is Crescent University located?
Who should I contact for admissions at Crescent?
responses: B.S. Abdur Rahman Crescent Institute of Science and Technology is located at GST Road, Vandalur, Chennai – 600 048, Tamil Nadu, India. For admissions inquiries, the help desk can be reached at +91 – 95432 77888 for undergraduate programs, +91 – 99530 77999 for postgraduate programs, and via WhatsApp at +91 94990 01725. For general inquiries, contact +91 44 2275 1347 or +91 44 2275 9200, or email admissions@crescent.education. More information can be found on their official website: crescent.education.

patterns: What are the visiting hours of Crescent University?
When can I visit the university?
University visiting time?
What time is Crescent University open?
Can you tell me the working hours of the university?
responses: The visiting hours for B.S. Abdur Rahman Crescent Institute of Science and Technology are Monday to Saturday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. The university is closed on Sundays and public holidays.
You can visit Crescent University between 9:00 AM and 5:00 PM from Monday to Saturday. It remains closed on Sundays and public holidays.
Crescent University is open for visitors from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday to Saturday. It is closed on Sundays and public holidays.
The university operates from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM on weekdays and Saturdays. Please note that it is closed on Sundays and public holidays.

patterns: What are the hostel facilities at Crescent University?
Does the university have a library?
Are there any sports facilities on campus?
responses: Crescent University offers well-facilitated hostels for both boys and girls with amenities like Wi-Fi, 24/7 security, study halls, mess facilities with vegetarian and non-vegetarian food, laundry services, and recreational areas. The hostels provide a comfortable and secure environment for students.

Yes, Crescent University has a well-equipped central library with a vast collection of books, research journals, e-books, and digital resources. The library provides a quiet study environment, computer access, and online databases to support students and faculty in their academic pursuits

Yes, Crescent University provides excellent sports facilities, including indoor and outdoor sports like basketball, football, cricket, badminton, volleyball, and a well-equipped gym. The university encourages students to participate in sports events and tournaments to promote fitness and teamwork.
